item1:
库位状态的维护
Maintenance of bin location usage status
item2:
当发现库位状态不正确时，可以做库位状态的修正
When the bin location usage status is found to be incorrect, you can modify the bin location usage status
item4:
发生库位状态不对情况
Incorrect situation of bin location usage status
item5:
库位信息的查询条件
Query conditions for bin location information
item6:
更新库位状态
Update bin location usage status
item7:
如果无符合条件的库位数据，系统将提示查无可用库位信息，用户可执行Data Inquire-->Q090 Location Usage Status Query作业查询库位数据与状态；或挑选指定的库位号
If there is no eligible location data, the system will prompt that there is no available bin location information. The user can run the Data Inquire-> Q090 Location Usage Status Query job to query the bin location data and status; or select the specified bin location number
item8:
1. 输入库存明细查询条件后点选Query查询库位数据
Enter the inventory details query conditions and click Query to query the bin location data
item10:
用户可执行Data Inquire--> Q090 Location Usage Status Query作业查询库位数据确认修改数据无误，或是在重覆操作步骤1确认
The user can execute Data Inquire-> Q090 Location Usage Status Query to query the bin location data to confirm that the modified data is correct, or confirm it in step 1
